'''''Spell of Unity''''' is the third part of the [[Tournament of Glory in Bloom]] Event.

==Steps==
# Wait until two days later
# Meet in the Speaker's Chamber to discuss the plan
# Attack the Children of Echoes' base
# Defeat the base guards and switch the flag
#* {{Color|old|Enemies:}}
#** Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Forged Sand Shieldbreaker;Forged Sand Interrogator;Forged Sand Javelineer;Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Rockbreaker Blade}}
#** Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Forged Sand Interrogator;Forged Sand Javelineer;Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Rockbreaker Blade*2}}
#* {{Color|new|Allies:}} {{Enemy List|Spiritspeaker Warrior: Determinator;Winged Warrior: Feathershedder}}
# Attack the People of the Springs' base
# Defeat the base guards and switch the flag
#* {{Color|old|Enemies:}}
#** Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Flowing Blade Skirmisher;Flowing Blade Grease-Saw;Koholasaurus Warrior: Waveshuttler;Koholasaurus Warrior: Reefsplitter}}
#* {{Color|new|Allies:}} {{Enemy List|Winged Warrior: Skymaster;Spiritspeaker Warrior: Psychokinetic}}
# Attack the Scions of the Canopy's base
#* Optional enemies: {{Enemy List|Flowing Blade Grease-Saw;Koholasaurus Warrior: Reefsplitter*2}}
# Defeat the base guards and switch the flag
#* {{Color|old|Enemies:}}
#** Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Flowing Skyfire*2;Swiftstep Armed Courier;Swiftstep Seeker}}
#** Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Flowing Skyfire*2;Yumkasaurus Warrior: Whirling Leaves*2}}
#* {{Color|new|Allies:}} {{Enemy List|Winged Warrior: Skymaster;Spiritspeaker Warrior: Determinator}}
# Take part in the celebration banquet
# Look for Ifa

==Gameplay Notes==
* During steps 3-8, the player will be in a [[Special Story Mode]], and the active party will be limited to a trial Traveler (Pyro), Iansan, Ororon, and Chasca.
** Additionally, during steps 5-6, a trial Citlali joins the active party.<!-- Is this the first time there have ever been 5 trial characters in one party? -->
** Leaving the Special Story Mode will reset the quest to Step 3, and all progress will be lost.
* All characters' [[energy]] and [[HP]] will be restored to full when the fight at the Children of Echoes base begins, after its flag is switched, after the flag at the People of the Springs base is switched, and when the fight at the Scions of the Canopy base begins.

==Dialogue==
{{Stub Dialogue|Check for missing lines.}}
{{Quest Description|Everyone decided to do something after hearing about how badly the last Bloomflower Trials went, and what happened to the little Qucusaur Antu. However, you'll need help from your other friends...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Enter the Speaker's Chamber)
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' *yawn*... So sleepy!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Didn't sleep well?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Yeah... I blame Kachina, being all mysterious about some gathering to discuss "something important." I was so curious, I couldn't stop tossing and turning the whole night!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Also, how come it's so quiet today? You didn't lock Ajaw up, did you?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 kinich 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' When I tried to wake him up this morning, his response was: "Leave me be, minion! Dar'st thou disturb the Almighty Dragonlord in our slumber?" I figured it would be for the best that he's not here anyway, so I didn't bother calling him again.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 04.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Haha, good thing you didn't tell him about our gathering. We could do without his gate-crashing, for sure...
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Not late, am I?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 01.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Nope, you're right on time. So, Ifa, now that everyone's here, shall we begin?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 01.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' *ahem*... Actually, today we have a big favor we'd like to ask of all of you.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 xilonen 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' What's up? Why so serious all of a sudden?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 02.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' It's... a long story. One that begins with a "mysterious friend" of Milray's...
:{{Black Screen|Ifa relates what happened in the Bloomflower Trials centuries ago, and the tale of the little Qucusaur, Antu.}}
:{{Black Screen|After hearing such a tragic tale, everyone seems a bit gloomy.}}
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 iansan 02.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Bloodshed between the tribes... That seems almost unthinkable today, but it was an everyday occurrence in that era.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 varesa 01.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' Even working together on something was impossible... That's just too awful!
:{{Introductory Note|Varesa}}
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 chasca 01.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' There have always been disputes, but once they escalated into fully-fledged clashes between tribes... Even a peacemaker would have been powerless to mediate.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' And that little Qucusaur, Antu, believed that the Sacred Flame Crystals harbored some kind of evil power that lay at the root of these inter-tribal conflicts.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 olorun 02.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' And that led to all the later misunderstandings. At this point, it would be nigh impossible to explain the truth to him... Granny's right, it would only make him suffer all over again.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That said, Antu will naturally sense that something's off once we've collected enough Sacred Flame Crystals and cure Milray, won't he?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' He'll see that no one has been "corrupted" and that all is as it should be. At that point, he would realize the truth of what happened in the past, even as young as he is.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 03.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Exactly. That's why we came up with a plan.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 04.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' When the second half of the tournament wraps up, we'll have enough Sacred Flame Crystals. That's when I want everyone to act like the Crystals have messed with us and start arguing.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 05.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Ooh, acting! That sounds fun. Then what?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 05.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Then, we'll bring Antu over and cast a "Spell of Unity" to cleanse all the bad vibes within the Sacred Flame Crystals and bring everyone back to their senses.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 06.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Of course, neither the evil power or the magic are real, but we've gotta make the lil' dude think he's done "something awesome."
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 xilonen 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Aha, yeah. I get where you're going with this.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 xilonen 03.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' The best way to make up for regrets is to do what you failed to do before. We'll recreate that scene from his past, only this time, he'll get the chance to rewrite the future.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 xilonen 04.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' So, how exactly are we going to do this? Is there anything we can look to?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 02.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Once, when I was reading a foreign book, I came across something called an "interactive play," designed specifically for kids.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 03.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' The story usually features a showdown between a hero and a villain, with twists and turns throughout. Just as things reach a climax, the hero will pretend to be losing and ask for the children's help.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 04.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Then, the children all raise their hands, lending their power to the hero and helping them defeat the villain.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 05.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' For the adults watching, it's just a performance, but the children will walk away feeling happy for days to come.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 06.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' At that age, happiness doesn't come from material rewards, but from "a heart that believes."
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 06.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' True! I can totally relate.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 07.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' When I helped out at my parents' shop as a kid, they would always intentionally leave me some simple tasks, like dusting down the shelves or making sure the merchandise was arranged neatly.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 08.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Then they'd shower me with praise when I was finished, saying stuff like, "Good job, Mualani, you're a genius!"... And the funny thing is, it always made me super happy!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 07.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Spot on, that's exactly it. We wanna make Antu feel the same way a kid who just helped a hero would, lessen his regret and pain... before he moves on.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 08.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Besides, Milray already heard the rumors about the Sacred Flame Crystals from him. If we don't dispel the "curse" right in front of him, he might refuse to take the medicine.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 09.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' But we can't pull off a show like that with just us. That's why I'm asking for your help.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 citlali 07.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' We'll probably need about five more people... *ahem* I mean, there are five more spots up for grabs. First come, first served!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 09.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' You have my board! Hehe, I'm probably the best at arguing here, don'cha think?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 10.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' We get some pretty rude customers in our shop, and I've had to develop quite a few communication skills to deal with them.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 olorun 03.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' You have my... cabbages? I can help prepare some props and special effects, like smoke to mimic the "evil power" and bright lights for the "Spell of Unity."
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' And my Flamestrider.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 11.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Oh, you're joining too, Archon?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' It really resonated with me when Citlali mentioned a clash between heroes and villains.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' And unlike the heroes in those plays, I've borrowed strength from all of you in the real world &mdash; and we've overcome powerful foes together as a result. I think I'll do justice to the role.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 xilonen 05.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' If Mavuika's on board, then you have my hammer. I'm really interested in the part where we "pretend to argue."
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 ifa 10.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Let's see. We've got our actors, and the stage is set. Now, we need a... director. A dude to run the show.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 kinich 03.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Wh&mdash;What's wrong? Why are you all looking at me?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 12.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Consider it our vote of confidence, Kinich!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 kinich 04.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Fine. Then you have my grappling hook. I happen to have some time.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 chasca 02.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' So that's everyone, then? In that case, Varesa and I will take care of the cleanup.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 varesa 02.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' Sorry, guys. I'd love to sign up, but I already promised to help transport the wounded.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 chasca 03.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' As for me... Ugh, if I see you all arguing, I wouldn't be able to resist stepping in.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 iansan 03.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' And I'm just really bad at acting. I'd be so stiff, the game would be up before we even got started.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 iansan 04.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' I'll stay and help the saurians search for Ocean Zephyrs. Once they've brought enough back, I'll join you as soon as I can.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 iansan 05.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' As our Archon herself often says, "we all have our own part to play"... Right?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 06.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That's right. Alright, once the second half of the exhibition match is over, we'll split into two teams and play our respective "parts."
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 13.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Great! Let's make the second half an even more exciting fight. That way, we'll be able to collect more Sacred Flame Crystals to help cure Milray.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mualani 14.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' I've even come up with a "secret strategy" that's sure to catch you all off guard!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 07.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' After centuries, we're holding the Bloomflower Trials once more. I hope that this time, we can bring them to a close free from regret.
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 08.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Are you all confident that we can do this?
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 together 01.ogg}} '''Crowd:''' Yeah!!!
:{{A|vo nteq003 1 mavuika 09.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Then let's get this show on the road!
:;(The competition begins)<!-- black screen transition, enter domain -->
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright, looks like everyone's here. Time for a strategy meeting!
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ugh, why do they keep picking battlefields covered in mountains that need climbing...
:{{DIcon}} ...But you can fly, Paimon.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 chasca 01.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' If you're worried about getting tired, I can just fly you straight to the top.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 chasca 02.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Launching a surprise attack on their base would also be a good tactic.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' I'll use smoke to sow confusion amongst their ranks, then you guys can just charge in and beat the living daylights out of them.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 chasca 03.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' It'll be over as soon as it began.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' *ahem* These two are in even more of a rush than Paimon is...
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Let's all just calm down for a moment. We don't even know what their formation will be like. Besides, if we don't deal with nearby opponents first, our main base could be at risk.
:{{DIcon}} Slow and steady wins the race.
:{{DIcon}} Let's start with the base at the foot of the mountain.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' But the area nearby is full of rocks... Looks like they're trying to block our path.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 iansan 02.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Pff, that's nothing. Let's just charge straight through.
:{{A|vo nteq003 2 iansan 03.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' C'mon, time for a warm-up!
{{Dialogue End}}

:{{A|vo nteq003 8 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Everyone, over here!
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Iansan! And... Whoa, that's a lot of saurians!
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 iansan 02.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' We've gathered enough Ocean Zephyrs! I asked them to give them to me, but they wanted to bring them over themselves.
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 iansan 03.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' So we came together. Here, I think this should be enough.
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 ifa 13.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Just hang on a moment, everyone. I'll go mix the ingredients.
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 ifa 14.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Hey, Cacucu, dude! Less chat, more help.
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 cacucu 03.ogg}} '''Cacucu:''' Sure thing, bro. I've got you, bro.
:{{Black Screen|Ifa quickly prepares the medicine and feeds it to Milray.}}
:{{Black Screen|Now comes the most important step of all...}}
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 ifa 15.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Phew... This is it. The moment we've all been waiting for.
:{{A|vo nteq003 8 ifa 16.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' O' Sacred Flame Crystal, forged by the will of many... Please, work your wonders and drive this sickness away.
:(A [[#Gallery|cinematic]] plays)<!--no voiced lines-->
:;(The Sacred Flame Crystal in Ifa's hand turns into a flame and flows into Milray's body)
:;(Milray's disease is cured and everyone cheers)
:;(Milray invites Antu to celebrate with him and Saurians of every kind parade them around the area)
:;(As they return to the crowd, Antu turns around to see the Night Kingdom where Nampole is waiting for him)
:;(Antu begins to run towards Nampole but stops and turns back to look at the crowd)
:;(He hesitates for a bit before waving goodbye to everyone and walking up to Nampole who gives him a long-awaited embrace)
:;(Cinematic ends)
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 milray 01.ogg}} '''Milray:''' Rawrrr...
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 ifa 01.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Cheer up, bro. It's always tough to lose a friend, but in this case, our parting is their reunion.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 ifa 02.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Antu's already wandered the world for way too long, but now that you're all fixed up, he can be at peace.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 ifa 03.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' His final wish was to be reunited with his bro, and he's done that. We should be happy for him, just like he celebrated your recovery.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 milray 02.ogg}} '''Milray:''' Wrrooah!
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 ifa 04.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Thanks a ton, everyone. With your help, I've been able to do what my ancestor could not.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 ifa 05.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Not only did we save this little saurian from his torment, we also made a historic contribution to the study of phlogiston-related diseases.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 ifa 06.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' ...As a physician, I'm honestly feeling touched and overwhelmed.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Well said. Then without further ado, I hereby announce that the Bloomflower Trials have come to a successful close!
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' From my perspective, though, this competition had another meaning. Throughout the event, I didn't witness any arguments, scheming, or plotting for personal gain. All six tribes united to accomplish something truly remarkable.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Even without the threat of the Abyss, we're still as close as family. We've surpassed those who came before us, and in the future, our people will surely grow more united still.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' So, in keeping with our traditions... It's time for a celebration. Let's make this a lively one, people!
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 together 01.ogg}} '''Mualani & Paimon:''' Woohoo!
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' As it happens, I picked a whole batch of fresh vegetables just yesterday. I'll go get them now.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Leave the meat to me.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 xilonen 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' And don't you dare skimp on it, Kinich.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' I'll go gather the others. Many hands make light work, and besides, the best meals are always ones prepared together.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' See you tonight, everyone.
:{{A|vo nteq003 9 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' See you tonight! Hehe, Paimon's ready for a feast and a half...
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Quest Description|update|After hundreds of years, Antu has made friends again and spent a joyful time with them. Its soul has returned to the Night Kingdom. The little Tepetlisaurus Milray has fully recovered, and the Bloomflower Trials concluded successfully. Now, it's time to celebrate.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Enter the Weary Inn)
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Kachina!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Hehe, fancy a slice of Volcano Cake? I baked it myself!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oooh, in that case, Paimon'd be glad to oblige!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So... good... Hehe, Paimon's tempted to eat the whole cake!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 02.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Go ahead! I made this specially for you guys!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 03.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Sweet cakes help people forget their worries, and I hope everyone can be happy every day!
:{{DIcon}} You seem to have bounced back, Kachina.
:{{DIcon}} I see the cloud hanging over your head during the competition has disappeared.
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 04.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Yep, I'm feeling much better! I definitely was unsure about where my future lay for a while there.
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 05.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' But reading through those old scrolls, I realized that the six tribes haven't always been so united. They used to argue a lot, and even got into big fights...
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 06.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' I've never experienced anything like that. I can barely imagine such a harsh way of life.
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 07.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' I love Natlan the way it is today, and I love spending time with my friends! As Uncle Pacal once told me, the harder something is to come by, the more we should treasure it.
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 08.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' So I've decided to always do my best to help and make sure my friends are happy. Most importantly, I want us all to stay united, forever and ever!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 09.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' I haven't figured out exactly how I'm gonna do that... But I can start with what I'm good at, like baking delicious crackers and cakes to share with everyone!
:{{DIcon}} Kachina...
:{{DIcon}} You're a good kid.
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Y'know what, Paimon just had an idea. You could open a cake shop!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That way, Paimon would be able to enjoy your cakes even more often than she already does...
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 10.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' You really think so? I'll have to get Mualani to teach me how to run a shop then...
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 11.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Baking delicious desserts every day and making everyone smile... That does sound like a wonderful life!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 12.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Thanks guys! I think I might've found a new goal to work towards.
:{{DIcon}} Good luck!
:{{DIcon}} I'll be rooting for you all the way!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' By the way, Paimon hasn't seen Ifa or that Qucu-Thesaurus yet. Any idea where they went?
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 kachina 13.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Before the party, I heard he was planning on heading up that hill to pay respects to his ancestor. They're not back yet?
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' If he doesn't get back soon, all the best food's gonna be gone!
:{{A|vo nteq003 10 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Guess we've got no choice but to take the cake with us and go check on them...

;(Talk to Kachina, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Want some more cake? I made plenty!

;(Talk to Ajaw or Kinich, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 ajaw 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' "I owe you an apology, too. I've been too harsh on you."
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 ajaw 02.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' *sigh* Wish I could've frozen that moment in time, so you could just listen to yourself!
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' A few more drinks, and who knows &mdash; you might hear it again, in your dreams.

;(Talk to Milray, Naiyan, or Varesa, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 varesa 01.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' The more meat you eat, the faster you'll recover!
:'''Milray:''' Roarrr!
:'''Naiyan:''' Rooooarrr!

;(Talk to Citlali, Iansan, or Ororon, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' I'm curious &mdash; how did you create that black mist?
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' It was just an illusion. If Granny had been the one doing it, she could've come up with something much more impressive.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 citlali 01.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Alright, alright, you can stop with the flattery. "Just an illusion?" Hmph, you're already good enough to fool me.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 olorun 02.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Oh... Err, is that incident still on your mind? I didn't exactly have a choice back then...
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 citlali 02.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Relax, I'm not here to dig up the past. I'm just saying you've got a real knack for illusions &mdash; and that's something to be proud of!
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 olorun 03.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Thanks, Granny.

;(Talk to Chasca, Mualani, or Xilonen, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' A toast &mdash; to the successful conclusion of the Bloomflower Trials! Cheers!
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 chasca 01.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Cheers! Finally, a few days off.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 xilonen 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Planning a vacation, are we?
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 chasca 02.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Judging from my experience with the Pilgrimage, things are pretty quiet for a few days after competitions. There usually isn't much trouble.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Yeah, competitions do take a lot out of everyone. We all need a good rest.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 chasca 03.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Cheers to that, and a long-overdue break.

;(Talk to Acatl, Amina, or Wayna, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 acatl 01.ogg}} '''Acatl:''' Try some, try some! How do they taste?
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 wayna 01.ogg}} '''Wayna:''' Delicious, as always. It's your signature dish, after all.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 amina 01.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Yum!

;(Talk to Biram, Mutota, or Pacal, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mutota 01.ogg}} '''Mutota:''' This wine's amazing.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 pacal 01.ogg}} '''Pacal:''' Of course! Wouldn't have made it into my collection otherwise.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 pacal 02.ogg}} '''Pacal:''' Drink as much as you like today, people. I mean, I owe you all one, don't I?
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 biram 01.ogg}} '''Biram:''' We might just have to take you up on that.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mutota 02.ogg}} '''Mutota:''' As much as we like? Haha, you might regret saying that!
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 pacal 03.ogg}} '''Pacal:''' Ahem... Uhh... Alright, bring it on!

;(Talk to Mavuika, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I've kept the extra Sacred Flame Crystals for future use. Next time you need some, just come to me.
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Also... This was my first time "acting" in a play like this. I find I really enjoyed it. What did you think of my acting skills?
:{{DIcon}} There's... certainly room for improvement.
::{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mavuika 03a 1.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Mmm, I'd have to agree with that. Seems like I still have a lot to learn.
::{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mavuika 03a 2.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Is it something you're good at? Some tips would be nice if we find a suitable time for it.
:{{DIcon}} You're a natural thespian!
::{{A|vo dialog nteq003 mavuika 03b 1.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Oh really? Well then, next time something like this comes up, don't forget to keep me in the loop.
----
;(Approach Ifa)
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 01.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Yo, ancestor man. Guess you're reunited with Antu already?
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 02.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' I have a Qucusaur companion too, so I totally get how you must've felt.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 03.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' First time I saw this dude, he was out in the wild, being bullied by other saurians because of his unusual appearance. He'd been pecked all over the place, bleeding from head to toe...
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 04.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' He barely made it. I gave him some meds, and from then on, he just stuck to me like glue. Even wound up becoming my assistant.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 cacucu 01.ogg}} '''Cacucu:''' Thanks, bro.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 05.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Hey, don't mention it, dude.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 06.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Being on the road with me as a vet was never gonna be an easy gig. One time, when we were treating a sick saurian, Cacucu got infected too.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 07.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' He ran a high fever, and I searched everywhere for ingredients and did everything I could for him. But despite giving it my all, he was right on the edge, man... and all I could do was keep praying.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 08.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' If he hadn't recovered, I know I'd have felt the same guilt you did.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 09.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Luckily, he managed to pull through, and he even stayed by my side helping me ever since. He's a solid assistant, no question.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 10.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' So yeah, Cacucu, I'm the one who should be thanking you.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 cacucu 02.ogg}} '''Cacucu:''' Hey, don't mention it, dude.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 11.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Your "medicine born of guilt"... Don't sweat it. We'll keep improving it as we go. You have my word.
:{{A|vo nteq003 11 ifa 12.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' That way, no one else will ever have to feel the same guilt that you did, ever again.

;(Talk to Ifa, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 ifa 01.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Huh? Yo, bros, what brings you guys here?
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Bringing our bros some cake, of course! Kachina made these herself, ya know &mdash; they're incredible!
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 ifa 02.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' For real? In that case, I gotta&mdash;
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 cacucu 01.ogg}} '''Cacucu:''' Oh wow, that's awesome, bro!
:{{A|vo dialog nteq003 ifa 03.ogg}} '''Ifa:''' Hey, save some for me!
{{Dialogue End}}
